summary: A computer programmer, also known as a coder, is someone who writes code to create software. They use special computer languages to instruct computers to perform specific tasks. Programmers are like authors, but instead of writing books, they create instructions for computers. The goal is to develop software that can solve problems or perform useful functions. The titles 'software developer' and 'software engineer' are also used for professionals who do this work.
title: Programmer
